content: * you can find the free pattern here - https //cozynooksdesigns com/oversizedcanvasvest 1 * you can find the lion brand yarn kit here 2 it comes with the free pdf digital download of the pattern and all of the yarn to make the kit you can customize the yarn colors the oversized canvas vest is a quick beginner crochet pattern that includes a video tutorial to help you make the beginner garment featuring oversized fit and a simple stitch you can wear it through season transition or layer it for a winter look designed with beginners in mind it s made using a larger-than-normal hook for a quick and satisfying crochet garment the vest has 3 easy-to-crochet panels that are seamed together and the pattern has video aids included so you ll have all the guidance you need to bring this comfy piece to life considered beginner level there is a full video tutorial the full video tutorial can be found here 3 pattern includes - instant download pdf file us crochet terminology tech-edited pattern gauge video level - beginner 9 sizes xs s m l xl 2x 3x 4x 5x materials - 320 355 385 425 465 500 545 590 640 yards of woolease thick & quick peanut weight 6 yarn 80% acrylic 20% wool 106 yds/170 g us m/n-13/9 0 mm crochet hook 3 - 1 1/8 buttons scissors tapestry needle you can purchase the lion brand yarn kit pattern and yarn colors of you choice here 4 - https //lionbrand sjv io/dygokn *** if you buy 2 patterns - use code 2patterns for 10% off if you buy 3 patterns - use code 3patterns for 15% off if you buy 4 patterns - use code 4patterns for 20% off 1 https //cozynooksdesigns com/oversizedcanvasvest 2 https //lionbrand sjv io/dygokn 3 https //www youtube com/cozynooksdesigns sub_confirmation=1 4 https //lionbrand sjv io/dygokn
